products.name: Farmacy Cleansing Balm
products.message: Great choice! This is an all-time favorite cleansing balm in the skincare community and makes for a great first cleanse.

products.name: Neutrogena Makeup Wipes
products.message: Uh oh! Makeup wipes are very harsh and stripping to the skin. There's also a good chance that when you use them you don't completely remove your makeup.

products.name: Garnier Micellar Water
products.message: Good choice! Some micellar water on a cotton pad is a simple way to remove your makeup and sunscreen. Micellar water is a better option than makeup wipes because you can really saturate your cotton pad so that it doesn't pull on your face!

products.name: KraveBeauty Hydrating Cleanser
products.message: Excellent choice! This is the perfect cleanser to remove impurities from the skin while keeping the skin hydrated.

products.name: Head & Shoulders Shampoo
products.message: Oh no! Please don't use shampoo as your cleanser. This can be incredibly stripping to the skin.

products.name: Vanicream Gentle Cleanser
products.message: Nice, this is an excellent option that's also quite affordable!

products.name: Haruharu Hyaluronic Toner
products.message: Nice choice! This is a good way to add hydration into the skin.

products.name: KraveBeauty Exfoliator
products.message: Good pick! This is a great way to exfoliate your skin in a non-irritating and soothing way.

products.name: Thayer's Toner
products.message: Oh no! This toner is quite drying.

products.name: KraveBeauty GBR Serum
products.message: This is a great option to help restore and maintain a healthy skin barrier! Good choice.

products.name: Naturium Hyaluronic Serum
products.message: Nice! This is great for hydrating the skin.

products.name: CeraVe Lotion
products.message: Amazing choice! This is a super affordable and great moisturizer for many skin types.

products.name: Clean & Clear Moisturizer
products.message: This is not such a great choice because it contains fragrance and could be irritating.

products.name: Biossance Omega Cream
products.message: Awesome selection! This cream is incredibly nourishing and great for those with drier skin types.

products.name: None
products.message: Oh no! Moisturizer is necessary for restoring and hydrating your skin.

products.name: The Ordinary Rosehip Oil
products.message: Excellent choice! Rosehip oil has so many great benefits for the skin and helps improve your skin barrier.

products.name: Coconut Oil
products.message: Coconut oil is not great for skin! It can be extremely thick and heavy and could cause skin congestion.

products.name: Biossance Squalane Oil
products.message: This is a great choice! Squalane is a very light oil that can lock in moisture in the skin.
